resources.string:
Agus Wahyu Setiawan
Jefanya Givenfirsta
Ravica Hayati
Muhammad Bayu Permana Putra
Nara Bagus Darmawan

In this version, the application will be taken from Mahabharata Epic, and there are two characters to pick, which are Yudhistira and Duryudhana. Now, do you love to be a hero like Yudhistira, or do you want to understand how villain like Duryudhana works out?

Once upon a time, Yudistira, the king of Indraprasta, got an invitation to play a dice game by Duryudana, the prince of his prideful kingdom, Hastinapura. Since he is respectful to Duryudana, he accepted the invitation, and come to Hastinapura right away.
Yudistira arrived at the front gate of Hastinapura. He got a warm welcome by Duryudana himself, and he is ready to play the dice around in Hastinapura.

Inside the palace, Yudistira and Duryudana will compete within each other in the dice game. However, Sangkuni, as the advisor for both players and as the dice thrower in the game, states that at least there is one thing that should be put in the bet. As Yudistira, what kind of thing that you choose to bet in the game?
And the bet goes on! Sangkuni throw the dice...
Duryudana insists that Yudistira should bet something so that he can play the dice game. If Yudistira does not bet, he said that he will kick you out from the game. What will Yudistira said?
And Sangkuni play dirty with the dice! You have lost the game. Because he had lost his weapons, he choose not to stop, and continue playing the dice game.
However, to continue the game, Yudistira must bet on something greater than his armors. Because of that, he choose to bet on his kingdom\'s wealth!
The storytext creation is still ongoing/onprogress.

OK, since I\'m running out of ideas, I want to tell that the demonstration ends here, no matter which choice that you are picking. One thing that is really sure, is that these pages will going to change, for sure.
This will be deleted later when the game development for this chapter is finished.
I\'ll bet my weapons and armors.
Okay then, I\'ll bet my weapons and armors.
I thought we were just playing for fun, without any bets! I\'m leaving!
Be different and be the side hero!
I WANT POWER, I WANT WORLD DOMINATION!
Since my spouse betrayed me, I\'m taking this type!
